original_title: Pantera - Live in Buenos Aires, Argentina
overview: Buenos Aires, Argentina, Tour name: South America 1998. Setlist: Mouth For War, Fucking Hostile, Interview with Dime and Vinnie, Walk, A New Level(cut), Becoming, Hard Lines, Sunken Cheeks, Sweet Leaf (Teaser), Cold Gin (Teaser), Cowboys From Hell
title: Pantera - Live in Buenos Aires, Argentina
